title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: As soon as the bus rolls intae St Andrew's Square we head straight doontae Montgomery Street, pickin up a cairry-oot on the wey.We're an ooirlate wi aw the traffic tryin tae git intae Edinburgh, cunts comin hame forthe New Year, n it's the back ay ten by the time we gits tae the MontyStreet pad, which Spud and Keezbo have sort ay inherited. A perty's infill swing and we join in wi gusto.
